entry.title: rohitghosh1763/IronCloak-AES-256: IronCloak is a lightweight password manager focused on simplicity and security. It encrypts your credentials and stores them securely in a MongoDB database. Built for reliability without unnecessary features, IronCloak ensures your passwords are safe and accessible only to you.
entry.content: IronCloak is a lightweight password manager focused on simplicity and security. It encrypts your credentials and stores them securely in a MongoDB database. Built for reliability without unnecessary features, IronCloak ensures your passwords are safe and accessible only to you.
